text: Klaus Wunder (13 September 1950 – 16 January 2024) was a German professional footballer who played as a striker. He earned one cap for the Germany national team and also represented West Germany at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Wunder died on 16 January 2024, at the age of 73.Bayern trauert um „Cäsar“ Klaus Wunder ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2024 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Thuringia Category:People from Erfurt
title: Klaus Wunder
